Title: Enacts the "protection, respect, inclusion, dignity, and equality (PRIDE) care act"
Summary: Establishes a home care services bill of rights for patients of home care services agencies and certified home health agencies; requires training for staff and contractors of such agencies to eliminate certain discriminations; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง3602, add ยง3604, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to enacting the "protection, respect, inclusion, dignity, and equality (PRIDE) care act"
